channel.title: Travel on Matt Jones
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Matt Jones

item.title: Skye 2
item.description: Just got back from spending New Year on the Island of Skye. Due to some tricky driving conditions and some poor navigating on my part, it took us a grueling 9 hours to get there, but it was [mostly] worth it. My only disappointment is that we didn’t see enough of the island, we just didn’t have enough time. Well actually, there was plenty of time, but we’re such an unorganised bunch that by the time we’d faffed around with breakfast, then sat around for a bit… then finally managed to put our walking boots on, it seemed to go dark (about 2.

item.title: Skye
item.description: Travelling 300 miles to the Island of Skye through snow and ice is not a good idea really is it? More later. Happy MMI
